original_title: The Australian Alps: Mirka's Palace of Dreams
overview: A magical documentary fantasy from a 1986 television series on Australian wilderness. Much-loved French-Australian artist Mirka Mora camps out in the winter snows of Kosciusko National Park with Tim Macartney-Snape (the first Australian to climb Everest) and his friend Sherpa Mingma.
title: The Australian Alps: Mirka's Palace of Dreams
